column6:
"THE SLAVERS," Part 1 (of 6),2005,9
On a pitch-black Brooklyn night, in a dead-end alley, Frank Castle brutally dispatches a crew of Albanian thugs that is menacing a young woman. Her name is Viorica, she's from Moldavia, and when she tells Frank her story, that's when the real killing starts.

32 PGS./EXPLICIT CONTENT ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Tim Bradstreet | colorist:Dan Brown | writer:Garth Ennis | penciller:Leandro Fernandez | letterer:Randy Gentile | inker:Scott Koblish
